name: Color Block Up
description:
---------------
Supersimple Gameplay:

Just swipe with one finger, avoid bombs and collect blocks.
---------------


You’ve waited for a very long time for this. Now it’s time to send those abduction rays down on the land! Avoid BomBlocks at all costs if you want to keep your cool and continue your raid on the blocks.

Tons of different levels
Challenging patterns
Beautiful areas
Easy gameplay

Keep your eyes on the prize!
